publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: A man from Zhèng was going to procure for himself a pair of leather shoes.

sense.def: As for the topic, there is N[SUBJ](A) 有 B: There is/exists a certain B (at/among A) 宋人有拔苗者

tls:text.tls:line: A man from Zhèng was going to procure for himself a pair of leather shoes.

sense.def: be about to V; have an intention to V

tls:text.tls:line: A man from Zhèng was going to procure for himself a pair of leather shoes.

sense.def: a certain, unidentified but in principle identifiable by the speaker, who

tls:text.tls:line: A man from Zhèng was going to procure for himself a pair of leather shoes.

sense.def: belonging to Zheng; of Zheng

tls:text.tls:line: A man from Zhèng was going to procure for himself a pair of leather shoes.

sense.def: a person/man from Npl

seg.line: 先自度其足而置之其坐，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 先自度其足而置之其坐，
tls:text.tls:line: He prepared by measuring his feet, and he placed the measure on his seat.

sense.def: as the first thing, to start with, before anything else, before something else

tls:text.tls:srcline: 先自度其足而置之其坐，
tls:text.tls:line: He prepared by measuring his feet, and he placed the measure on his seat.

sense.def: his, her, its

tls:text.tls:srcline: 先自度其足而置之其坐，
tls:text.tls:line: He prepared by measuring his feet, and he placed the measure on his seat.

sense.def: and then, and thereupon

tls:text.tls:srcline: 先自度其足而置之其坐，
tls:text.tls:line: He prepared by measuring his feet, and he placed the measure on his seat.

sense.def: his, her, its

tls:text.tls:srcline: 先自度其足而置之其坐，
tls:text.tls:line: He prepared by measuring his feet, and he placed the measure on his seat.

sense.def: the contextually relevant present and object (non-anaphoric)

tls:text.tls:line: By the time he went to the market he forgot to take the measure along.

sense.def: market; also more generally: the marketplace (with gates??); market settlements

tls:text.tls:line: By the time he went to the market he forgot to take the measure along.

sense.def: and

tls:text.tls:line: By the time he went to the market he forgot to take the measure along.

sense.def: the contextually relevant present and object (non-anaphoric)

tls:text.tls:line: He had already found some shoes,

sense.def: by this time, already; after; after a while

tls:text.tls:line: He had already found some shoes,

sense.def: manage to get, obtain; get hold of, find (what one is looking for); manage to find (one's proper place)

tls:text.tls:line: but then he said:

sense.def: thereupon, then

tls:text.tls:line: but then he said:

sense.def: say: S

tls:text.tls:line: "Oh, I forgot to take along the measure"

sense.def: I (unmarked, non-contrastive, weak)

tls:text.tls:line: He returned home to pick it up,

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned person: him, her, it; you

tls:text.tls:line: but by the time he returned,

sense.def: when it came to the point that S, by the time that S, at the point when S

tls:text.tls:line: but by the time he returned,

sense.def: return, get back to where one came from; make one's return; flee back

tls:text.tls:line: and so in the end he did not get his leather shoes.

sense.def: so in the end, then in the end, and in the end; then (as things turned out)

tls:text.tls:line: and so in the end he did not get his leather shoes.

sense.def: not

tls:text.tls:line: and so in the end he did not get his leather shoes.

sense.def: manage to get, obtain; get hold of, find (what one is looking for); manage to find (one's proper place)

tls:text.tls:line: and so in the end he did not get his leather shoes.

sense.def: leather shoes; footwear; general term for a shoe

tls:text.tls:line: Someone said:

sense.def: a man, someone

tls:text.tls:line: Someone said:

sense.def: say: S

tls:text.tls:line: "Why didn't you, for example, try them on your feet?"

sense.def: you surely should, why don't you

tls:text.tls:line: "Why didn't you, for example, try them on your feet?"

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned person: him, her, it; you

tls:text.tls:line: "Why didn't you, for example, try them on your feet?"

sense.def: try (something N1) out on (something N2)試諸木土

tls:text.tls:line: He replied:

sense.def: say: S

tls:text.tls:line: than trust myself."

sense.def: 自己把自己 preposed object: oneself as the object, 自殺"kill oneself" Latin: semet ipse (not semet ipsum!)

tls:text.tls:line: than trust myself."

sense.def: final particle marking non-narrative judgemental statements

tls:text.tls:line: than trust myself."

sense.def: will never (in generalisations); at no time (during a certain period), never (無有 there never are any)

tls:text.tls:line: Zhòu laid on a long drinking bout one long evening.

sense.def: the last, traditionally viewd as totally wicked, ruler of the Shāng dynasty

tls:text.tls:line: Zhòu laid on a long drinking bout one long evening.

sense.def: undertake; do deliberately (something right or something wrong), commit (a crime etc); act out (a virtue); conduct (government); engage in (thievery); set out to do

tls:text.tls:line: Zhòu laid on a long drinking bout one long evening.

sense.def: the period of the day while the sun is down, night

tls:text.tls:line: Zhòu laid on a long drinking bout one long evening.

sense.def: NP1 indicates the duration in time of NP2 三年之喪
minister of the contextually determinate superordinate person

tls:text.tls:line: He was so happy that he forgot what day it was.

sense.def: and then; so that

tls:text.tls:line: He was so happy that he forgot what day it was.

sense.def: come to lose what one used to own (e.g. a city, an arm); lose control of; fail to get right what one ought to get right (timing); MENG: fail to stick to (the Way), stray from, disregard; lose count of (the date); stray from (the right road); lose contact with (a person)

tls:text.tls:line: He was so happy that he forgot what day it was.

sense.def: day, the length of a day counted as day-time; day on which something is to be done>date

tls:text.tls:line: He asked his entourage

sense.def: his own

tls:text.tls:line: He asked his entourage

sense.def: the members of the political entourage (of a king etc), aide; senior employees of a household

tls:text.tls:line: He asked his entourage

sense.def: ask N2 about the contextually determinate N1 問左右

tls:text.tls:line: and the whole lot of them had no idea.

sense.def: all subjects indiscriminately, all subjects without exceptions; without exception

tls:text.tls:line: and the whole lot of them had no idea.

sense.def: not

tls:text.tls:line: and the whole lot of them had no idea.

sense.def: know it, know anything about the contextually determinate thing

tls:text.tls:line: Then he sent someone to ask Jīzǐ.

sense.def: and thereupon, and then accordingly; then without delay;Then accordingly (often after a direct speech)

tls:text.tls:line: Then he sent someone to ask Jīzǐ.

sense.def: send the contextually determinate N to V

tls:text.tls:line: Then he sent someone to ask Jīzǐ.

sense.def: a person, someone

tls:text.tls:line: Then he sent someone to ask Jīzǐ.

sense.def: ask N2 about the contextually determinate N1 問左右

tls:text.tls:line: Then he sent someone to ask Jīzǐ.

sense.def: Standard Name: Jī Zǐ 箕子 Personal Name: Xū Yú 胥餘 Unger no. 304 ????

tls:text.tls:line: Jīzǐ told his followers:

sense.def: address

tls:text.tls:line: Jīzǐ told his followers:

sense.def: discpiles, adherents

tls:text.tls:line: "When one is the ruler over the world

sense.def: count as N, be Npr, be an N

tls:text.tls:line: "When one is the ruler over the world

sense.def: in/of the world

tls:text.tls:line: "When one is the ruler over the world

sense.def: 周主

tls:text.tls:line: and everyone in the whole state forgets the date

sense.def: and

tls:text.tls:line: and everyone in the whole state forgets the date

sense.def: all, every, the whole 一國 "everyone in the state"

tls:text.tls:line: and everyone in the whole state forgets the date

sense.def: the people in the state

tls:text.tls:line: and everyone in the whole state forgets the date

sense.def: hyperbolic: everyone in the whole state

tls:text.tls:line: and everyone in the whole state forgets the date

sense.def: everyone; anyone; all of them (quantifies then) (The manifest verbal derivation is from "be together", hence this is not construed as an nadV.)

tls:text.tls:line: that means that the world is probably in danger.

sense.def: All under Heaven; the Empire

tls:text.tls:line: that means that the world is probably in danger.

sense.def: presumably, - I suppose -, perhaps; apparently???

tls:text.tls:line: that means that the world is probably in danger.

sense.def: be in a precarious state; be fraught with danger, be doomed to imminent disaster; be endangered; to risk danger

tls:text.tls:line: that means that the world is probably in danger.

sense.def: currently relevant verbal statement; new situationtensed

tls:text.tls:line: and only I know what date it is

sense.def: but

tls:text.tls:line: and only I know what date it is

sense.def: I (on the other hand), I for my part, I as opposed to others

tls:text.tls:line: and only I know what date it is

sense.def: quantifier adv referring to the subject, rarely the object: only

tls:text.tls:line: and only I know what date it is

sense.def: know, be sure of; know all about

tls:text.tls:line: and only I know what date it is

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned person: him, her, it; you

tls:text.tls:line: I am probably in danger."

sense.def: I (unmarked, non-contrastive, weak)

tls:text.tls:line: He declined to answer on the grounds that he was unaware because of drunkenness.

sense.def: apologise on the basis of S

tls:text.tls:line: He declined to answer on the grounds that he was unaware because of drunkenness.

sense.def: be drunk

tls:text.tls:line: He declined to answer on the grounds that he was unaware because of drunkenness.

sense.def: and in that way, and thus, and as a result, and consequently

tls:text.tls:line: He declined to answer on the grounds that he was unaware because of drunkenness.

sense.def: because
